name: Zelda: Monarch Madness
description:
Princess Zelda has received a message from the goddess Hylia. Although Hyrule may be at peace, other worlds aren't so lucky. As such, Hylia has tasked the Princess to assist in keeping the balance on these adjacent worlds by doing specific actions...

However. Handling three dimensions at once may be a little too much of a workload for Zelda, thus she must avoid crumbling under the pressure of the task so that the balance can be maintained across all worlds.

Good Luck!
